ACC taxi service: Annual spend blows out to $35 million; injured user left in pain by no-show taxis says provider ‘a disgrace’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/acc-taxi-service-annual-spend-blows-out-to-35-million-injured-user-left-in-pain-by-no-show-出租车说提供商耻辱/EBVY72MOHRF5TDF5LS6WJE76LI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/acc-taxi-service-annual-spend-blows-out-to-35-million-injured-user-left-in-pain-by-no-show-出租车说提供商耻辱/EBVY72MOHRF5TDF5LS6WJE76LI/ Nicholas JonesBroken ankle sufferer left standing in street in pain for taxis that never arrived. Mon, 15 Apr 2024 17:00:00 +0000 ACC spent over $35 million last year on taxi rides for recovering clients who require help to attend medical treatment or to get to work. One man who relied on the service after breaking his ankle says the frequency of late arrivals and no-shows was disgraceful.
